content.rendered:
Jenna and Dave had a romantic winter wedding with fun florals and an epic dance party at The Bell Tower. And it's safe to say we're still swooning.

In April of 2019, Dave asked Jenna to marry him on their back patio. He tied a note around their dog that read, “dad has an important question to ask you, please say yes!” Adorable!

When it came to the big day, it was important to have good music, a good photographer, and to keep the day as stress-free as possible. As for the venue, The Bell Tower was the first one they toured.

The day kicked off with a sweet first look on the patio and some wedding party pictures taken around downtown. Jenna had her girls dressed in colors of deep green and burgundy with fun, colorful bouquets.

After Jenna and Dave said their vows between the arched windows, guests enjoyed a traditional cocktail hour on the patio.

For the reception, the main space was set with neutral linens and modern centerpieces. After guests found their seats, a yummy buffet opened for dinner. Selections included haricot verts casserole, sun-dried tomato creamed spinach, cheddar cheese and chive smashed potatoes, arugula salad, and last but not least, chicken and waffles. Yum.

This sweet couple finished their night with a whole lot of dancing, a traditional garter toss, and a bit of karaoke to top it all off!

Keep scrolling for more details from Jenna and Dave's romantic winter wedding.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: January 25, 2020
Bride & Groom: Jenna and Dave
Location: The Bell Tower
Guest Count: 175
Colors: Burgundy, Green & Navy
Photographer: John Myers Photography
Florist: Echoes of Eden
Cake: Publix Bakery
Linens: Music City Tents
DJ: Bizz and Everyday People
Catering & Bar: The Bell Tower
Production: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Kalyn | IH

excerpt.rendered: A romantic winter wedding ceremony and reception at The Bell Tower.
